title: Ep114: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Battle of Kohima Part 1
itunes:title: Ep114: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Battle of Kohima Part 1
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary continue their exploration of the service of the Royal Norfolk Regiment in WW2 with a multi-part series about Kohima, a forgotten battle of the war. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki...
description:
Pete and Gary continue their exploration of the service of the Royal Norfolk Regiment in WW2 with a multi-part series about Kohima, a forgotten battle of the war.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
